## PolyAsyncIterable.drop() method

Return a new iteration that skips the first `num` elements. If there were less than `num` elements in the iteration, no elements are yielded.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
drop(num: number): PolyAsyncIterable<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  num | number | The number of elements to skip |

<b>Returns:</b>

PolyAsyncIterable&lt;T&gt;

a new [PolyAsyncIterable](./polyethylene.polyasynciterable.md) that yields the same the elements of `this`<!-- -->, except for the first `num` elements
